column1: * U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), Economic Research Service (ERS). 2014 Eating & Health Module: Machine-readable microdata files, supplement to the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) 2014 American Time Use Survey, May 2016.
* Edit the infile statement to reference the data file on your computer.
infile "c:\ehresp_2014.dat" lrecl=8192 dsd dlm="," missover firstobs=2
length TUCASEID $14 TULINENO EEINCOME1 ERBMI ERHHCH ERINCOME ERSPEMCH ERTPREAT ERTSEAT ETHGT ETWGT
EUDIETSODA EUDRINK EUEAT EUEXERCISE EUEXFREQ EUFASTFD EUFASTFDFRQ EUFFYDAY EUFDSIT EUFINLWGT
EUSNAP EUGENHTH EUGROSHP EUHGT EUINCLVL EUINCOME2 EUMEAT EUMILK EUPRPMEL EUSODA EUSTORES
input TUCASEID TULINENO EEINCOME1 ERBMI ERHHCH ERINCOME ERSPEMCH ERTPREAT ERTSEAT ETHGT ETWGT
EUDIETSODA EUDRINK EUEAT EUEXERCISE EUEXFREQ EUFASTFD EUFASTFDFRQ EUFFYDAY EUFDSIT EUFINLWGT
EUSNAP EUGENHTH EUGROSHP EUHGT EUINCLVL EUINCOME2 EUMEAT EUMILK EUPRPMEL EUSODA EUSTORES
label EEINCOME1 = "Edited:  Last month, was your total household income before taxes more or less than (amount) per month?"
label ERHHCH = "Change in household composition between CPS and ATUS"
label ERINCOME = "Relationship between income and poverty threshold"
label ERSPEMCH = "Change in spouse or unmarried partner's labor force status or full time or part time employment status between CPS and ATUS"
label ERTPREAT = "Total amount of time spent in primary eating and drinking (in minutes)"
label ERTSEAT = "Total amount of time spent in secondary eating (in minutes)"
label EUDIETSODA = "Was the soft drink diet, regular or did you have both kinds?"
label EUDRINK = "Not including plain water, were there any other times yesterday when you were drinking any beverages?"
label EUEAT = "Were there any times you were eating any meals or snacks yesterday, for example while you were doing something else?"

label EUEXERCISE = "During the past 7 days, did you participate in any physical activities or exercises for fitness and health such as running, bicycling, working out in a gym, walking for exercise, or playing sports?"
label EUEXFREQ = "How many times over the past 7 days did you take part in these activities?"
label EUFASTFD = "Thinking back over the last 7 days, did you purchase any: prepared food from a deli, carry-out, delivery food, or fast food?"
label EUFASTFDFRQ = "How many times in the last 7 days did you purchase: prepared food from a deli, carry-out, delivery food, or fast food?"
label EUFFYDAY = "Did you purchase any prepared food from a deli, carry-out, delivery food, or fast food yesterday?"

label EUFDSIT = "Which of the following statements best describes the amount of food eaten in your household in the last 30 days - enough food to eat, sometimes not enough to eat, or often not enough to eat?"
label EUFINLWGT = "Eating and Health Module final weight"
label EUSNAP = "In the past 30 days, did you or any member of this household receive [fill State SNAPNAME], SNAP, or food stamp benefits?"
label EUGENHTH = "In general, would you say that your physical health was excellent, very good, good, fair, or poor?"
label EUGROSHP = "Are you the person who usually does the grocery shopping in your household?"
label EUHGT = "How tall are you without shoes? (in inches)"
label EUINCLVL = "Identifies which income values were asked in EUINCOME1 and EUINCOME2"
label EUINCOME2 = "Last month, was your total household income before taxes more or less than (amount) per month?"
label EUMEAT = "In the last 7 days, did you prepare any meals with meat, poultry, or seafood?"
label EUMILK = "In the last 7 days, did you drink or serve unpasteurized or raw milk?"
label EUPRPMEL = "Are you the person who usually prepares the meals in your household?"
label EUSODA = "Were any of the beverages soft drinks such as cola, root beer, or ginger ale?"
label EUSTORES = "Where do you get the majority of your groceries?"
label EUSTREASON = "What is the primary reason you shop there?"
label EUTHERM = "Did you use a food or meat thermometer when preparing any of those meals?"
label EUWGT = "How much do you weigh without shoes? (in pounds)"
label EUWIC = "In the last 30 days, did you or any member of your household receive benefits from the WIC program, that is, the Women, Infants, and Children program?"
1 = "Number of persons living in ATUS household > number of persons living in the CPS household at time of last CPS interview"
2 = "Number of persons living in ATUS household < number of persons living in the CPS household at time of last CPS interview"
3 = "Number of persons living in ATUS household = number of persons living in the CPS household at time of last CPS interview"
3 = "130 % of poverty threshold < Income < 185 % of poverty threshold"
1 = "Spouse/unmarried partner's employment status changed from full time to part time or hours vary"
2 = "Spouse/unmarried partner's employment status changed from part time or hours vary to full time"
3 = "Spouse/unmarried partner's labor force status changed from employed to unemployed or not in the labor force"
4 = "Spouse/unmarried partner's labor force status changed from unemployed or not in the labor force to employed"
5 = "Spouse/unmarried partner's employment and/or labor force status did not change"
3 = "Split it equally with other household member(s)"
71 = "Don't know to assigned from respondent's earnings"
72 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent's spouse or unmarried partner"
73 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent's other household members (not spouse or unmarried partner)"
74 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent and respondent's spouse or unmarried partner"
75 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent and respondent's other household members (not spouse or unmarried partner)"
76 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent's spouse or unmarried partner and respondent's other household members"
77 = "Don't know to assigned from earnings of respondent, respondent's spouse or unmarried partner, and respondent's other household members"
82 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent's spouse or unmarried partner"
83 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent's other household members (not spouse or unmarried partner)"
84 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent and respondent's spouse or unmarried partner"
85 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent and respondent's other household members (not spouse or unmarried partner)"
86 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent's spouse or unmarried partner and respondent's other household members"
87 = "Refused to assigned from earnings of respondent, respondent's spouse or unmarried partner, and respondent's other household members"
